message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
Hi Alice,  $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product but I can only go up to $100 at this point.
Hi Bob, I understand your concern about the price, but I think the product is really valuable to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110.
Alice,  I appreciate you coming down on the price. $110 is still a bit high for me. How about $105?
Hi Bob, I understand you're still hesitant, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $108.
